original_text: But if you have gone astray, though you are under your husband's authority, and if you have defiled yourself, and some man other than your husband has lain with you,
korean_text: 그러나 네가 네 남편을 두고 탈선하여 몸을 더럽혀서 네 남편 아닌 사람과 동침하였으면

sentences.original_text: But if you have gone astray,
though you are under your husband's authority,
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 남편의 권위 아래에 있음에도 불구하고,

sentences.original_text: and if you have defiled yourself,
and some man other than your husband
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신의 남편이 아닌 어떤 남자가
